title: "An Unspecified Error Occurred" while trying to patch hotfix.
body: So when I try to update League after today's hotfix, it'll start calculating differences and scanning files until it hits a certain number (around 1200?) where it will jump to "updating interface 32%" and I'll get "an unspecified error occurred". I tried numerous times, running a VPN, restarting my computer, disabling my antivirus, and restarting my router to no avail. I can't uninstall league to reinstall because it gets stuck on "preparing to uninstall".

replies.body: Okay turns out I had some drive errors that I had to fix. Thanks for the help!

At 32%, your patcher is still scanning files but needs permission.  A setting with your OS may be preventing your files from completing the scan, and needs access.  As a first step, I suggest going over our [permissions ](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204134104-Setting-up-your-Permissions)guide which will provide a series of instructions to restore permissions to your game files.  This should get you fixed up!
